column4: - do you maybe have an idea as to why deleting the .mp3 files i put in my friend's ipod via rhythmbox has caused me to be unable to copy any more files to my ipod?  note: i even manually deleted the files after i noticed that rhythmbox had not actually removed the files from the ipod's file directories ... so i removed all those files and their empty directories, even rebooted this ubuntu box and again ran the commands from  htt
did you empty the trash?
- i emptied the trash on my desktop and rebooted since then ... or do  u mean did i empty the trach via the ipod itself? (i don't know how to do that)
you worked so hard to install those files then immediately deleted them?
- those were only the first files i had to copy there anyway
what about other mp3s? do they copy over correctly?
- nope, i tried that as well before asking in here :)
I know amarok; rhythmbox not so much
- ok thanks :)
- i fixed it :)
how?
nice work then! ;] (the fix I mean)
- yeah thanks again, :)  good questions from you and others, plus logic and trial & error contributed to how it got figured out.  :)
- miro is an RSS video grabber ... will it also work on clips from the typical video sites, youtube, myspace, revver, etc ?
well for the ones like google video youtube and others it it great to search and grab stuff--otherwise the firefox plug in for space book etc
yeah that miro can eat up the hdd ;]
- i'll try to restart gnome
- right
it rocks ;]
then you might want miro (to download from dailymotion, googlevdieo etc)
yeah miro ... i tried that once, it worked nice. thanks :) forgot aall about that one.
